Description:
A Gardeners Delight
Four bedrooms plus 5th bedroom/office with toilet, hand basin and external entrance attached to the large double garage.
Located on a private, quiet 2000 sqm block is this beautifully presented 4/5 bedroom home. All bedrooms have large built in robes, the master with en-suite and double built in robes.
The kitchen features an abundance of cupboards, ample bench space and a duel fuel 90cm SMEG cooker. There is also a gas wall oven for extra entertaining.
The attractive living/dining/kitchen area features a large combustion wood heater and a gas wall heater for cosy winter living, with evaporative and reverse cycle air conditioning for summer comfort.
A separate lounge room with feature electric wall heater and adjoining dining room complete the home.
There is a large undercover entertaining patio/veranda all set in lovely established gardens, fully enclosed with colorbond fencing.
In the rear section of the property is a 50m x 20m shed with power and concrete floor, work benches and shelving and a 2.5kw solar power system. A 22700 litre water tank, orchard of peaches, nectarines, apricots, blood plum, orange and lemon trees, raised vege garden beds and a compost system complete the perfect picture.
Insights: 12 Cobb Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home Buyers/Investors Dream!!!
Walk straight in and enjoy from day one. Affordable, neat, great back yard, shedding and position. It ticks all the boxes. The home includes 3 bedrooms, built in robes, ensuite to main, formal lounge, open plan kitchen/meals, gas heating and air-conditioner. Situated on a good size allotment with covered outdoor entertaining area, carport, lock-up garage/shed, handy caravan port and garden shed. Close to Kangaroo Flat shopping, train station, schools and on the Melbourne side of Bendigo. For the investor simply start renting from day one. expected rent $280-$300pw. For the first home-buyer enjoy the convenience of the position, and the ability to walk in and start enjoying without having to renovate. This is an absolute beauty, don't delay!

Description:
Just like new
Positioned just a short and pleasant stroll from the Community Clubhouse, this lovely two-bedroom villa located in the Aviva Residential Village offers stylish, secure and comfortable living for over 55's. This light filled home is less than 2 years old and is in mint condition.
The open plan living area is bright and inviting and includes a lounge, kitchen and dining space. The kitchen has a 600mm electric oven, 4 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher, pantry with drawers and plenty of additional storage.
There are two good sized bedrooms both with spacious built-in robes and ceiling fans.
The bathroom has 900mm x 1200mm shower and a vanity with ample built-in storage. The separate toilet is just off the laundry. The laundry is neat and tidy with a storage cupboard and has side door access to the carport. There is a stepped ramp from the laundry to the carport for easy access.
Outside there is a single carport with automatic roller door. There's also a small garden shed, a clothesline, established gardens and a generously spaced yard.
Heating and cooling are taken care of with ducted gas heating, a reverse cycle split system in the living area and ceiling fans throughout. There is also quality window furnishings and floor coverings throughout.
Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid like-minded neighbours with the added benefit of community facilities such as CCTV security, community centre incorporating lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, gym, cinema, indoor/outdoor bowling, workshop/woodworking room and has a place to store the boat or caravan between trips.
Weekly Fees are $166 per week for a single person with a potential rent assistance amount of $67 being available to eligible people. These fees cover all maintenance in the grounds, use of the facilities & council rates, they do not cover water rates, insurance, gas, phone or power for the individual units. Please note these fees are approximate and subject to change.
It's a short walk to Lansell Square shopping centre with public transport at the front and walking tracks nearby. Call for further information about Unit 120 today.
Internal area
89m²

Description:
Convenient Lifestyle & Tastefully Updated Residence
Offering exceptional value and a warm welcoming feel, is this beautifully presented home, that has been updated recently to provide modern comforts and tastefully selected colour schemes.
Adaptable floorplan comprises 4 spacious bedrooms (or 3 plus office), open plan kitchen/meals and sitting area, formal lounge, and separate bathroom and laundry facilities.
Improvements include a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, updated bathroom, and updated floor coverings.
Spacious allotment approx 605m2 in size offers side vehicle access for those looking to store a caravan, trailer or boat. Abundant space for children and pets to enjoy.
Carport and workshop/garage provide off-street car parking or an area for the handyman.
Youll be kept comfortable all year round with gas heating, along with a split system heating/cooling unit.
Situated only a few minutes walk to the outstanding new Kangaroo Flat leisure/acquatic centre, with schools, train station, medical, and shopping facilities also within very close proximity. Kangaroo Flat is a thriving suburb with exceptional facilities, and this property is sure to be a quality proposition for investors, or an appealing residence for the owner occupiers.

Description:
Acreage in suburbia.
Unique property offers the best of both worlds with a land footprint of 8781sq mts (approx 2.2 acres) plum in the middle of suburban Kangaroo Flat.
It's within walking distance to Lansell Square shopping centre and Big Hill Primary School but surrounded by tranquil bush and rural outlooks.
Set in a no-through road, the one-owner, JG King steel-framed home offers four bedrooms, two bathrooms, lounge, and expansive open-plan living, dining and kitchen areas opening to covered alfresco.
Main bedroom off the entry hall includes walk-in robe and ensuite while remaining three robed bedrooms are located beyond the living areas.
The separate lounge has French doors opening to a side verandah while the expansive open living, dining and kitchen can cater to a crowd when the occasion rises.
Preparing family feasts will be a joy in the kitchen equipped with gas cooktop, under-bench oven, and good storage including double pantry.
Verandahs all round protect the house from summer heat and provide sheltered outdoor living in cooler months while the alfresco deck is the perfect place to kick back and relax under the ceiling fan while the kids play under the trees. Or you could sit on the front verandah and watch the cows grazing across the road.
Outside, the elevated lot includes a Colorbond shed approx 4m x 3mfor the handyman, raised vegetable beds to grow your own produce, rainwater tank, sprinkler system, town water and just the right mix of landscaped gardens and natural bushland at the rear.
It's a great family-oriented property with lots of space, inside and out.
Potential subdivision opportunity (STCA).

IMMACULATELY PRESENTED HOME IN FANTASTIC LOCATION

A sliding door from the kitchen/meals area leads outside to a covered rear entertaining area, established gardens and private and secure rear yard. Also adjoining the home is a two car remote lock up garage. Set in a quiet location only metres from the Bendigo Regional Park and with great access to all of the handy services Kangaroo Flat has to offer. This is a very comfortable low maintenance home which would suit owner occupiers and investors alike.

Description:
This property will appeal to a broad market.
A classic cream brick veneer nestled in Broad Court, not ten minutes from the heart of Bendigo.
Now ready for a new owner, the house stands proudly in near original (but well maintained) condition that could be moved into without any further outlay.
It has three good size bedrooms, all with BIR and ceiling fans. A large living area, dining, and a neat and functional kitchen with gas cooking and a three-piece bathroom. At the rear of the home is the additional bonus of the 3m x 4m sunroom, ideal for entertaining and all year-round use. With gas heating and air conditioning the climate is always comfortable.
Situated on a 717 sqm allotment, there is a large back yard for pets, kids or to grow your own veggies.
First home, last home or a solid investment ...this home has plenty to offer.

Description:
Your Own Little Oasis In The Heart Of Kangaroo Flat
Nestled in Elda Court, this property is a hidden treasure with nearby walking tracks and ornamental lake.
It's a classic brick veneer house on a generous block with neighbouring Gateway Park and Bendigo Creek Trail.
The home offers two large living areas as well as family dining and well kept retro style kitchen.
In fact, the entire home is in excellent condition with mostly original decor throughout.
Climate control options, ceiling fan, adequate storage, practical kitchen, family bathroom and a separate laundry are included.
This home is a rare find, and the new owner will love the back yard.
It's a bird lovers paradise, overlooking natural bush land and beautiful gum trees.
Land size measures about 690 square meters with a carport and a lock up garage or workshop.
Walk to schools, shops, public transport and Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre.

Description:
Perfect Starter!
Neat and affordable, this renovated home offers the perfect stepping stone for first home buyers, investors or those needing a bit of extra space. The central kitchen has been completely renovated and features plenty of bench space, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. Three generous bedrooms all with split system heating and cooling and even a clever little study nook at the front entry make this one ideal. Great lounge area, polished floor boards throughout and sits atop concrete stumps. Outside features ample space, a delightful veggie garden, garden sheds and a 6m x 6m shed or garage depending on your need. With little left to do, simply move in and enjoy!

Description:
Exceptional Entertaining With Great Views
Located in a quiet neighbourhood on an elevated block with uninterrupted views is this quality built family home. With four bedrooms all with built in robes and the master with walk in his and her robes and ensuite. The open plan kitchen is positioned to take full advantage of the two large entertaining areas to the side of the house. With garden shedding and a large flat backyard this is the family home you have been searching for.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with walk in his and her robe and ensuite
3 other bedrooms with built-in robes
Linen and coat cupboards
Open plan kitchen
Ducted evaporative cooling
Ducted gas heating
Outside Features:
Double garage with auto door and rear roller door
large timber entertaining deck
Two Garden sheds
Rain water tank
2.5KW solar panels
A beautifully presented home in a quiet location still within close proximity to primary school, Lansell plaza shopping centre, recreational facilities and all conveniences.

Description:
4 Bedroom Home with Side Access
Spacious and bright, this 4 bedroom family home situated on 1000m2 is perfect for a growing family.
Established in a new home area, this property ticks a lot of boxes for those wanting space both inside and out, and the back yard is a clear canvas ready for you to put your own personal touches to it.
Comprising main bedroom with ensuite, separate toilet, and 2 large walk-in robes, while the other 3 bedrooms have built-in robes.
The second bedroom creates its own semi-ensuite feel, knowing it has direct access into the main bathroom.
The large open plan area has glass sliders that open up onto the stone washed and timber deck area.
Kitchen with all the mod cons you would expect. Ducted heating and cooling throughout, loads of storage, double garage with internal access, and landscaping to the front.
Sited on over 1000m2 of land with side access, so there's plenty of room to build a shed that suits you.
Minutes to Kangaroo Flat shops, schools, buses and medical clinics.

Description:
Stylish 1 bedroom + Study Townhouse
Impeccably presented, stunning timber floors bring welcome contrast and visual warmth to the decor. Highly efficient, the 1 bedroom plus study floorplan has no hallways to waste expenditure on unutilised energy, by not heating and cooling unused spaces.
This is evident in the European-style laundry and galley kitchen, where quality fittings and finishes include stone benchtops and a sleek ceramic glass cooktop. As well as a light-filled living-dining room, there is a substantial computer room for use as a home office. Lit by an interior window during the day, a spacious shower-room also contains the toilet and vanity. Reverse cycle air-conditioning sustains continuous relief from external temperatures.
A complete wall of built-in robes supplies sufficient storage in the bedroom.
Entirely landscaped grounds in attractive yet easy to care for fashion makes life even more restful at this address, as does the private rear courtyard.
An extra-wide single carport has your vehicle covered too.
This surprisingly handy location is within 8 to 20 minutes stroll of shopping, sports club, leisure centre, pub, medical facilities, train station and much more. Bus stops are around the corner, Bendigo is just 5 kilometres away, Melbourne under 150 into the CBD.
It's a townhouse that truly encapsulates a lifestyle of relaxation and convenience.
Currently tenanted at $260 per week until 19th June 2020.
Insights: 6/21 John Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
CALLING ALL INVESTORS!! POSITIVE CASH FLOW!!
This could be your opportunity to add to your investment portfolio or to take your first step into the property market at a very reasonable price. This low maintenance three-bedroom brick veneer home is ideally suited to an investor as there is an excellent tenant in place until April 2020 and hoping to stay on.
Located close to pre-school, primary school, secondary school, public transport, shops, the new Aquatic Centre and only a 10-minute drive to Bendigo CBD.
The home comprises of three bedrooms, two with built in robes and they all share the family bathroom which has shower, bath and vanity. There is a separate toilet located off the laundry. The light & bright kitchen has a gas free standing stove, corner pantry, plenty of cupboards & bench space. The adjacent dining space is large enough for the family dining table and has a glass sliding door that leads to the outdoors. The carpeted lounge is located at the front of the home and is the perfect spot to relax with family and friends or to watch TV. Gas heating and a split system control the climate throughout the year.
Stepping outside finds a single carport behind double gates for off street parking, grassed backyard for the kids or pets to play, garden shed and secure fencing, all on an easy to manage 414Sqm block.
Currently let at $265 per week to an excellent tenant.
It all adds up to an impressive package and is sure to attract a number of buyers
Call today to arrange an inspection.
